pages.text: The warp whistle allows you to teleport back to your spawn under certain conditions.$(br2)For it to work, you must play the whole song, while the overworld sky is visible.$(br2)A warp whistle can be found rarely in almost any Terramity structure.

pages.title: Tornado
pages.text: After using the warp whistle, a small tornado will be left where you used it for 15 seconds.$(br2)Anyone that steps on it will also be transported to your spawn, including players.
